pkgmetadata.longdescription: Causal Mediation Analysis // We implement parametric and non parametric mediation analysis. This package performs the methods and suggestions in Imai, Keele and Yamamoto (2010) DOI:10.1214/10-STS321, Imai, Keele and Tingley (2010) DOI:10.1037/a0020761, Imai, Tingley and Yamamoto (2013) DOI:10.1111/j.1467-985X.2012.01032.x, and Imai and Yamamoto (2013) DOI:10.1093/pan/mps040. In addition to the estimation of causal mediation effects, the software also allows researchers to conduct sensitivity analysis for certain parametric models.
